title: Suggestion to improve the mastery page and mastery selection in the lobby
body:
Hi,

My suggestion here is for the masteries (I've created 3 basic paint images to show the gist of what I'll be talking about).

____________________________________
**The Mastery Page**

http://imgur.com/adlVZWd
This one is the mastery page itself, the idea is that there are tabs to which when clicked, show a drop down menu listing the mastery pages associated with a particular lane.

Clicking the ADC tab will show all mastery pages created for the ADC role. You could also be able to drag and drop them to change their order (TL'S = Thunderlord's, WLB = Warlord's Bloodlust and so on) so if I used ADC 4 more than the rest, I could drag it to the top and change it's name without having to reconfigure the page itself.

This would go for all lanes and if I wanted to create another tab, it would be as simple as creating another page currently (just clicking the + button). That way for some pages which I have named Top/AP Support I could put them under a tab labelled "Hybrid" since it is used for more than one lane.
____________________________________
**The Mastery Page Variant**

http://imgur.com/CWRLvwX
If not a drop down, it could instead use the second idea which instead groups them inside a rectangle labeling from above.
____________________________________
**In Game Lobby**

http://imgur.com/TUpwcdN
This one is for the in game lobby. This is just a way to show the drop down menu with all pages grouped with their appropriate tab. All ADC pages under the ADC heading and so on. This would make it easier for people to find the page they're after if someone suddenly locks in the lane that they had called or even if there was an agreement to change lanes. They wouldn't have to frantically search, if they suddenly change from ADC to Jungle, they just have to find the Jungle heading and click the page they're after.

There's a poll for like/dislike so that if it gets enough likes, the devs just might consider it.

Thanks in advance

replies.body:
Not a bad idea.

I think it might be a lot easier for them to simply allow us to move the pages in order of where we want them instead though.

I'd like a similar feature for champions too. I'd like to create custom lists for champs. So I can type in "top" and see all my top laners when im picking a champ. Much like an ADC can type in "marksman" and see all the choices.

I agree it would be easier but my main thought here is that allowing us to sort them using my idea, will in turn give us the lobby drop down menu as well (which shows them in their respective sections, ADC ; Mid etc)

This would then also change them from just the numbered squares to the drop down with the name of each page, or if the second idea is used they'll at least be grouped to make it easier (similar to how you've suggested). My problem is that if they still used the numbered squares, it would still be a slight pain for me to find the exact one I'm after because I have to hover over them for the tooltip and look through them. ( I say this because I have 17 mastery pages which is likely to increase over time)

____________________________________________________

In regards to your champ sorting idea, I do agree with the idea however I can see a lot of people saying it's redundant given you can type a champion's name. Though I like it seeing as you might be unsure about who you want to play and looking at all champs you play for that lane does help.
LSI allowed custom champion lists. So i know its possible, all it needs its official implementation.
Oh cool, well I am more than on board for that. I'd love to see that implemented.

i would prefer many different variants to mastery selection than the current one. i think the biggest changes riot might be looking to implement is making the client a lot more accessible such as being able to swap around rune and mastery page orders in the client as well as maybe some other things

so with masteries, there are countless champs who can run countless fairly viable builds. many would agree that just having 100 or more mastery pages would be better for them, especially if they're serious about their pages each and every game. 

for your suggestion specifically, 5 ADC pages, and assumingly, 5 maybe even 10 definitive pages for mid/top/support/jung, is not enough pages for a lot of people to run, EVEN with just the 10 champs they play in each role. if you then had 10 pages in each role equaling 50 pages, it would not only still be difficult to maintain and update with the meta and other factors and whatnot, it would actually take longer and be more tedious than just 20 pages. sure ADC you could have 10 pages on all of them easily, but what if you do wanna start playing singed after playing only assassins like zed yasuo talon, all of which you might have 1 mastery page for. ideally your masteries should be updated frequently and giving people the option to have more than 20 will only make it possibly frustrating and boring for those people (not me, id like more pages and id like to change them when id need to)

1 thing id suggest is that you could always just change the names of your mastery pages to be more "captivating" and make it seem more organised by changing the names of them, and grouping them in order of their roles like the way you've put, like having ADC pages from 1-5 and you can just name them ADC DFT - ADC FOB etc
I guess this could apply to Rune Pages as well?
